name: Kirby has a Gun
description:
IMPORTANT: 

  • Controls are at the bottom. 
  • Every 10 enemies you kill you get 1 life back.
  • Taking an enemy's ability will take away 1 life from you. be careful.

DESCRIPTION

So what if instead of fighting normally, Kirby shot his enemies? Worse, what if the way you take an enemy's power is by shooting them with a different kind of gun? Even worse, what if taking an enemy's powers hurt you? Yeah that's this game. "Why?" you ask, because I can. Chain Together the 2 abilities to unlock a special combo that would've made sense if I had a day to make another enemy and ability.

This game was made for the Triple TriJam Game Jam where you had to make a game with 3 builds in 9 hours with the following themes: Chain Reaction, Negative Feedback Loop, and a Novel Twist on a Classic Game.

Finally, Kirby with a gun, what else do you need to know.

CURRENT BUILD

This is the 2nd build. It doesn't feel good yet, in the next 3 hours I plan to add particle effects, camera shake, and music, if I'm lucky I'll try sound effects for the first time. The art here is extremely rush but I like it cause it makes the game look even more chaotic which is the goal. I also haven't included any in-game control instructions but I'll add that later on.
